Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.EnderLite.Controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class - responisble for all decisions, operations and verification

      Method responsible for sending async messages for every connected client (except the sender)
      Parameters:

      Method responsible for sending async messages for known user
      Parameters:
      cmd - Command to send
      uuid - ID of known user

      Response

    • REQ_INV_LOG

      public void REQ_INV_LOG(String userToInvite, String invitingUser)
      Responsible for sending friend invites Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      userToInvite - Invited user login
      invitingUser - Sending user login

    • REQ_INV_EMAIL

      public void REQ_INV_EMAIL(String emailToInvite, String invitingUser)
      Responsible for sending friend invites Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      emailToInvite - Invited user email
      invitingUser - Sending user login

    • REQ_DEL_LOG

      public String REQ_DEL_LOG(String userToDelete, String deletingUser)
      Responsible for deleting friends from friends list Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      userToDelete - Deleted user email
      deletingUser - Deleting user login
      Returns:
      Response

    • REQ_INV_STATUS

      public void REQ_INV_STATUS(String invitingUser, String invitedUser, String status)
      Responsible for confirmation of friend invites Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      invitingUser - Sending user login
      invitedUser - Invited user email
      status - Invite status; ACCEPT to accept an invite, DENIED to deny it

    • REQ_CRT_CHAT

      public String REQ_CRT_CHAT(String login, String chatName)
      Responsible for creating Chat Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      login - User login
      chatName - Created chat name
      Returns:
      Response

    • REQ_ADD_CHAT

      public String REQ_ADD_CHAT(String chatName, String sendingLogin, String[] usersToAdd)
      Responsible for inviting users to chat Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      chatName - Selected chat name
      sendingLogin - User login
      usersToAdd - Array of logins of users that should be added to the chat
      Returns:
      Response

    • REQ_CHAN_CHAT_NAME

      public String REQ_CHAN_CHAT_NAME(String login, String oldChatName, String newChatName)
      Responsible for changing chat name Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      login - User login
      oldChatName - Old chat name
      newChatName - New chat name
      Returns:
      Response

    • REQ_CHAN_CHAT_RANK

      public String REQ_CHAN_CHAT_RANK(String chatName, String requestingLogin, String changedLogin, String rank)
      Responsible for changing members rank in the chat Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      chatName - Selected chat name
      requestingLogin - Sender user login
      changedLogin - Target user login
      rank - New rank; Can be either ADMIN or USER
      Returns:
      Response

    • REQ_DEL_CHAT

      public String REQ_DEL_CHAT(String chatName, String sendingLogin, String[] usersToRemove)
      Responsible for removing Users from Chat Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      chatName - Created chat name
      sendingLogin - User login
      usersToRemove - Array of logins of users that should be removed from the chat
      Returns:
      Response

    • REQ_DES_CHAT

      public String REQ_DES_CHAT(String login, String chatName)
      Responsible for destroying Chat Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      login - User login
      chatName - Destroyed chat name
      Returns:
      Response

    • SEND_DATA

      public String SEND_DATA(String login, String chatName, String data)
      Responsible for sending messages to a chat Can be efficiently invoked only when session is Authorized
      Parameters:
      login - User login
      chatName - Chat name
      data - Message content
      Returns:
      Response
